---

The logo images are stored in `/docs/logo/`:

- **Light mode logo**: `docs/logo/light.svg` - displayed when the user is in light mode
- **Dark mode logo**: `docs/logo/dark.svg` - displayed when the user is in dark mode

There are already placeholder SVG files there. Simply replace them with your own logo files:

```
docs/
└── logo/
    ├── light.svg   ← Logo for light backgrounds (typically darker logo)
    └── dark.svg    ← Logo for dark backgrounds (typically lighter logo)
```

Mintlify recommends SVG format for logos, but PNG and other formats work too. If you use a different format, update the paths in `docs.json`:

```json
"logo": {
  "light": "/logo/light.png",
  "dark": "/logo/dark.png"
}
```
